snippet: Officers responding to a 911 call found four men who had been held against their will so their captors could collect their welfare checks, the authorities said.
abstract: Texas authorities say that officers responding to 911 call found four men who had been held captive for weeks and months at a home in Houston so their captors could collect and cash their welfare checks.
lead_paragraph: Officers responding to a 911 call found four men who had been held against their will so their captors could collect their welfare checks, the authorities said.

headline.main: Men Found Captive in Houston Home
headline.print_headline: Texas: Men Held Captive for Welfare Checks
